legal.title: Legal Information
legal.subtitle: Terms of Service & Privacy Policy
legal.betaDescription: The Trading Diary is currently in beta. Features and services are provided "as is" and may change without notice. We appreciate your feedback as we continue to improve.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using The Trading Diary, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

service.title: 2. Description of Service
service.content: The Trading Diary provides a comprehensive trading journal and analytics platform. Our services include:

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized access to your account.

payment.title: 4. Payment and Subscriptions
payment.content: Subscription plans are billed monthly or annually. All fees are non-refundable except as required by law or specified in our refund policy.
payment.refundDetails: If you are not satisfied with your subscription, you may request a full refund within 7 days of your initial purchase. Refunds are only available for first-time subscriptions.

disclaimer.title: 5. Trading Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The Trading Diary is a tool for tracking and analyzing your trades. We do not provide investment advice. Trading involves risk, and past performance does not guarantee future results. You are solely responsible for your trading decisions.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time for violation of these terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service will immediately cease.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes via email or through the platform. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: This Privacy Policy explains how The Trading Diary collects, uses, and protects your personal information. We are committed to protecting your privacy and complying with applicable data protection laws, including GDPR.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect the following types of information:

items.trading: Trading data (trades, performance metrics, journal entries)
items.usage: Usage data (pages visited, features used, time spent)
items.technical: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)

items.service: To provide and improve our services
items.improvements: To develop new features and improvements
items.communication: To send service updates and marketing communications (with consent)

gdpr.title: 4. GDPR Rights
gdpr.content: If you are in the European Union, you have the following rights:

rights.access: Right to access your personal data
rights.erasure: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

sharing.title: 6. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share anonymized, aggregated data for analytical purposes. We may share data with service providers who assist us in operating our platform (e.g., hosting, analytics).

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and provide personalized content. You can control cookies through your browser settings.

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, please contact us at:

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about The Trading Diary

whatIsJournal.question: What is a trading journal and why do I need one?
whatIsJournal.answer: A trading journal is a record of all your trades, including entry/exit prices, profit/loss, emotions, and strategies used. It helps you identify patterns, improve decision-making, and track your progress over time.

howHelps.question: How does The Trading Diary help me become a better trader?
howHelps.answer: The Trading Diary provides analytics, performance tracking, and insights from your trading history. By analyzing your wins and losses, emotional patterns, and strategy effectiveness, you can make data-driven improvements to your trading approach.

assetTypes.question: Can I track both crypto and stock trades?
assetTypes.answer: Yes! The Trading Diary supports all asset types including cryptocurrencies, stocks, forex, commodities, and more. Simply enter the asset name when logging your trade.

security.question: Is my trading data secure?
security.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption to protect your data. Your trading information is private and only accessible to you.

metrics.question: What metrics does the dashboard show?
metrics.answer: The dashboard displays key metrics including total P&L, win rate, average trade duration, ROI, and more. You can also see charts showing your performance over time and by different strategies.

userGuide.title: User Guide
userGuide.description: Access complete tutorials, documentation and platform usage tips.
userGuide.subtitle: Learn about each feature through step-by-step guides, explanatory videos and best usage practices. Always available for quick reference.

marketDataWidget.title: Market Data

livePrices.title: Live Prices ‚Äî Customize Your Assets
livePrices.description: View real-time quotes of your favorite cryptocurrencies.
livePrices.subtitle: Click to add or remove assets from your watchlist, reorder according to your preference and track percentage changes, 24h volume and market cap instantly.

settingsCapital.title: Configure Your Initial Capital
settingsCapital.description: Set your initial capital value for accurate ROI and performance calculations. This value can be edited at any time.
settingsCapital.subtitle: When adding more capital, the system will automatically calculate the weighted average considering deposit dates, ensuring metrics are always updated and proportional to your real investment.
